abstract: Grifols, the healthcare group based in Barcelona that produces treatments based on blood plasma, said Monday that it had agreed to acquire Talecris, a U.S. biotherapeutics company in the same sector, for about $4 billion including debt.
snippet: Grifols, the healthcare group based in Barcelona that produces treatments based on blood plasma, said Monday that it had agreed to acquire Talecris, a U.S. biotherapeutics company in the same sector, for about $4 billion including debt.
lead_paragraph: 3:48 p.m. | Updated Grifols, the health care group based in Barcelona that produces treatments based on blood plasma, said Monday that it had agreed to acquire Talecris, an American. company in the same sector, for $4 billion including debt.

headline.main: Grifols Buys Cerberus’s Plasma Firm for $4 Billion
